headline: Nasdaq Appoints Brandis DeSimone as New Head of East Coast Listings
summary: The appointment strengthens Nasdaq’s commitment to supporting companies throughout their corporate lifecycle Nasdaq is the exchange of choice for new listings and exchange transfers in the US, raising $22.97 Billion in IPO proceeds across 180 listings in 2024 and celebrating over 500 transfers to Nasdaq since 2005 NEW YORK, March 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today announced the appointment of Brandis DeSimone as Senior Vice President, Head of East Coast Listings.
